column1: Excuse me. That was pretty impressive down there. You boys have a nice cock.
I've never seen a rooster throw down spells with such raw brutality. How would you like to move him up to the big time?

Oh yes. And I'm not talking about the basement of some seedy Chinese restaurant, I'm talking about the basement of a well-established Chinese franchise. Saturday night, here's the address.  Let's see what kind of money your cock can really make.
Alright, your rooster's up next, boys.
What do you think all these people are here to see?
The hell you do! Get your cock in there!
Lousy cops! How did you find us?
We didn't put those fliers out!
